metadata.title: CVE-2023-22845 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the TGAInput::decode_pixel()functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.7.1. A speciallycrafted targa file can lead to information disclosure. An attacker canprovide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-22845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenimageio2.4t64 - 2.4.17.0+dfsg-1.1build4
openimageio-tools - 2.4.17.0+dfsg-1.1build4
python3-openimageio - 2.4.17.0+dfsg-1.1build4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openimageio package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.17.0+dfsg-1.1build4').
